description: Main Dart source file for a Flutter application that sets up a simple UI with a centered message and a loading indicator

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up the theme and home page

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title and dynamic state

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the scaffold with app bar and body

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application that runs the MyApp widget

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the UI
